title: Center for Academic Success
cleaned_text: and East Asian Mountain Road Stowe, VT 05672 p: [802-253-8483](tel:802-253-8483) Credentials LiMing Tseng, LicAc, MAcOM, Dipl OM (NCCAOM) is licensed acupuncturist in Stowe, VT. She co-chairs the NCCAOM ASA Acupuncture Medicine Cultural Competency Task. She is a former Board member and secretary of the American Society of Acupuncturists (ASA) (2015-2021). In addition to numerous acupuncture medicine related certificate programs, she has also completed the Diversity & Inclusion certificate program from Cornell University. She obtained her Masters of Acupuncture and Oriental Medicine from the New England School of Acupuncture with a concentration on Chinese Herbal Medicine, as well as Traditional Japanese Medicine. Her bachelor's degree in biochemistry and molecular biology is from Wells College. Masters in Acupuncture & Oriental Medicine, New England School of Acupuncture Bachelor's of Art, major of Biochemistry & Molecular Biology, Wells College Diversity, Equity & Inclusion certificate from Cornell University Acupuncture - (Traditional Chinese Medicine, Classical Chinese Medicine, Traditional Japanese Medicine), Chinese Herbal Medicine, Chinese Medical Aromatherapy, Tuina, Cupping, Lifestyle, and Dietary Therapy. Cancer LiMing Tseng hasn't specified any additional languages.
